alert.note: Alert for Person (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 02 at 2:35PM EDT until July 02 at 3:30PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: The National Weather Service in Raleigh has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Person County in central North Carolina... * Until 330 PM EDT. * At 233 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Westover Hills to Bethel to near Camp Springs, moving east at 30 mph. This storm has a history of producing straight line wind damage in Henry County in Virginia. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Roxboro, Concord, Bethel Hill, Bushy Fork, Hyco Lake, Mayo Reservoir, Hyco Marina and Surl. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Straight line winds can blow down trees, power lines, and damage mobile homes and other buildings. Seek shelter in a sturdy structure until the storm has passed. Stay away from windows as flying debris generated by damaging winds can be deadly.
